title: I been permently banned
body: I been permently banned for being toxic and never recived any other banned before is there anyway I can be unbanned ill do anything I spent hundreds on this game and don't want to lose my accunt so if there is anything I can do I will do you can permently ban me for typing in chat idc ill do sanyhtring or can you ban me for 14 days or something

replies.body: 0 to perm is unusual. Would you be so kind and provide the chat logs? If you don't have logs, please give us a screenshot of what it says when you try to log in.

Getting permbanned for toxicity with no previous warnings is completely impossible.

If you want to lie, at least try to be believable, not that it matters, because riot has the logs. People dont get off permbans unless it was determined to be an accident like a scripting false positive - this was obviously not.
if your perma banned, you lost your account.

To be permabanned you CLEARLY have been banned at least twice in a single year and you still choose to continue your bullsh** so no you definitely don't deserve to be unbanned. Start out fresh on a new account if you wanna keep playing.
